participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and determined, Jessica is passionate about sports and has a resilient spirit.
participant_1.background: i love playing softball. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. my mom passed away when i was young. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, Marcus enjoys making music and has a fun-loving attitude.
participant_2.background: my pets name is charlie. i drive a 2015 honda civic. i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. my favourite food is pizza.

content.text: hello, how are you? I am playing softball with my mom
